term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - ratemeter in radiochemistry
term.title: ratemeter

item.text: An electronic sub-assembly which gives a continuous indication proportional to the average counting rate over a predetermined time interval (time constant).

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1550 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
